```{r}
library(lpSolveAPI)

```


```{r}
x <-  read.lp("Heart Start.lp")  # create an lp object x

x                            # display x

```

```{r}
solve(x)
get.objective(x)   # get objective value
get.variables(x)   # get values of decision variables
get.constraints(x) # get constraint of RHS values
```
